p: A breath mark indicates a point at which the performer of a wind instrument or singer may breathe. It is sometimes also used to indicate a short pause or break for instrumentsnotrequiring breath, which allows it to also serve as a guide to phrasing. In MEI, breath marks are encoded using the breath element, which is a member of model.controlEventLike.cmn. It is a semantic error not to specify a starting point attribute. The usual sign for the breath mark is a comma; however, other visual forms of the breath mark may be indicated using the@altsymattribute (see chapter for further details).
